message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to me is at least $12000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer! I understand that $12000 is a bit below my initial asking price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13500. This is a great compromise that still reflects the product's value to me. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to go up to $13000, but no higher. Can you consider that price?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're still a bit short on budget, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13250. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to go up to $13000, but I'm not sure if I can go any higher. Can you consider that price?
